name: RPS Quest (SaikingS)
description:
Have you ever waked up one day with a though "I wanna beat the shit out of stereotypical 
fantasy creatures by playing Rock Paper Scissors"? Well, now you can fulfill your dreams. 
Welcome to RPS quest!
